TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextRange extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents a selection of content between two positions.

span.span: Represents a selection of content between two positions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类引入了以下术语。The class introduces the following terminology. - **所选内容**-是选择的内容所指示的两个位置之间**TextPointers**。**Selection** - A is a selection of content between two positions indicated by **TextPointers**. 其中一种定位固定的定位点，根据所选内容，而另一个位置是可移动。One of these positions a fixed anchor with respect to the selection, while the other position is movable. 这是类似于通过使用鼠标或键盘的用户所做选择的行为方式。This is similar to how a selection made by a user using the mouse or keyboard behaves. - **当前所选内容**-因为始终指示所选内容在内容中，则最好仅仅是指由所选内容作为*当前所选内容*。**Current Selection** - Because a always indicates a selection in content, it makes sense to simply refer to the selection indicated by a as the *current selection*. - **文本容器**-*文本容器*窗体手头的流内容的最终边框的元素; 由所选内容始终处于内的文本容器。**Text Container** - A *text container* is the element that forms the ultimate border for the flow content at hand; the selection indicated by a always falls within a text container. 目前，文本容器必须是或。Currently, a text container must be either a or a . - **文档**-包含的文本容器内的全部内容被称为*文档*。**Document** - The content collectively contained within a text container is referred to as a *document*. 有关其他详细信息相关这样的字词*位置*，请参阅。For more information about other related terms like *position*, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用的属性返回指定的纯文本表示形式。The following example demonstrates using the property of a to return the plain text representation of a specified . [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, taking two specified positions as the beginning and end positions for the new range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个选择所指示的两个位置之间构成**TextPointers**。A is formed from a selection between two positions indicated by **TextPointers**. 这些位置之一 (为由`position1`) 固定的根据所选内容，而另一个位置 (由`position2`) 是可移动。One of these positions (indicated by `position1`) is fixed with respect to the selection, while the other position (indicated by `position2`) is movable. 这是类似于通过使用鼠标或键盘的用户所做选择的行为方式。This is similar to how a selection made by a user using the mouse or keyboard behaves. 新的实际端点可能会进行调整以匹配适用于包含新的文档的任何内容选择试探。The actual ends of the new may be adjusted to match any selection heuristics that are applicable to the document that contains the new . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将构造函数。The following example demonstrates the use of the constructor. param.name: stream
param.span: A readable stream that contains data to load into the current selection.

param.span: A data format to load the data as.

span.span: A data format to load the data as.

param.span: Currently supported data formats are , , , and .

span.span: Currently supported data formats are , , , and .

summary.span: Loads the current selection in a specified data format from a specified stream.

span.span: Loads the current selection in a specified data format from a specified stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`为`stream`，内容流开始加载到流的末尾。If is `true` for `stream`, content will be loaded from the beginning of the stream to the end of the stream. 否则，将从当前读取内容到流的末尾。Otherwise, content will be read from the current to the end of the stream. 此方法返回时，`stream`打开和中的当前位置处于`stream`是不确定的。When this method returns, `stream` is left open, and the current position within `stream` is undefined. 加载操作用新加载的内容替换当前所选内容。A load operation replaces the current selection with the newly loaded content. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`preserveTextElements`是`false`的自定义对象将保存为已知类型。When `preserveTextElements` is `false`, custom objects are saved as known types. 例如，假设您创建一个自定义称为`Heading1`，后者又继承。For example, suppose you create a custom called `Heading1`, which inherits from . 当调用此方法替换`preserveTextElements`设置为`false`，`Heading1`转换为时保存。When you call this method with `preserveTextElements` set to `false`, `Heading1` is converted to a when the is saved. 当调用此方法替换`preserveTextElements`设置为`true`，`Heading1`没有要转换的情况下保存。When you call this method with `preserveTextElements` set to `true`, `Heading1` is saved without being converted. 若要保留自定义文本元素`dataFormat`必须设置为。To preserve custom text elements, `dataFormat` must be set to . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets the plain text contents of the current selection.

span.span: Gets or sets the plain text contents of the current selection.

value.span: 包含当前所选内容的纯文本内容的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the plain text contents of the current selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来提取当前选定内容，而不考虑可能会显示任何格式设置中的纯文本内容。Use this property to extract the plain text content in the current selection, regardless of any formatting that may be present. 新的换行符和分段符被视为相对于此属性的等效项。New line characters and paragraph breaks are treated as equivalent with respect to this property. 任何类型的当前选定内容中的内容分隔符转换到新行时读取此属性。Any types of content breaks present in the current selection are converted to new lines when this property is read. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将属性。The following example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]
